catalog_info.title: Introductory Hindi-Urdu
catalog_info.description: An introduction to the lingua franca of the subcontinent in its ``Hindustani'' form. Students are introduced to both the Perso-Arabic and the Devanagari script systems. Conventional teaching materials are supplemented by popular songs and video clips from Bollywood. Students must complete both terms of this course (parts A and B) within the same academic year in order to receive credit.
